Id: 20cf746c-c765-402a-885e-c389c64478ce
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager ABAC Custom Resources Reader
Description: Allows read-only access to view Kubernetes custom resources on Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager fleets. This role enables viewing custom resources without the ability to create, modify, or delete them. Applying this role at cluster scope will give read access to custom resources across all namespaces. More information on supported attributes for Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) conditions can be found under documentation at aka.ms/aks/abac/custom-resources/docs
Link: https://management.azure.com/20cf746c-c765-402a-885e-c389c64478ce?api-version=2022-04-01

Id: 673366d4-9664-4020-b03b-b0093366bff9
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager ABAC Custom Resources Writer for Member Clusters
Description: Allows write and delete access to manage Kubernetes custom resources on Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager member clusters. This role enables creating, modifying, and deleting custom resources. Applying this role at cluster scope will give access to custom resources across all namespaces. More information on supported attributes for Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) conditions can be found under documentation at aka.ms/aks/abac/custom-resources/docs
Link: https://management.azure.com/673366d4-9664-4020-b03b-b0093366bff9?api-version=2022-04-01
